short_summary: Notice of Proposed Procurement for the CT114 aircraft of the Department of National Defence
description: Supply Arrangement: W8485-184741 Series Aviation Replacement Parts. Solicitation: W8485-237146/A. This requirement is to acquire two items for the CT114 aircraft of the Department of National Defence (DND), Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 5-2-7-2. This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open only to Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.
full_summary:
[Title]
Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series: Aviation Replacement Parts
=================================================================
**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

**Reference No:** PW-22-01012223
**Solicitation No:** W8485-237146/A
**Date of Publication:** November 02, 2022
**Closing Date and Time:** November 16, 2022, 14:00:00

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**

The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series: Aviation Replacement Parts. This procurement is only open to Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of the aforementioned series.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The procurement is for the acquisition of two (2) items for the CT114 aircraft. The items required are for the Department of National Defence (DND), Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 5-2-7-2.

**Eligible Bidders**
-----------------

The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* JHT Defense Inc.
* Aero Technical Components Inc.
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* Simex Defence Inc.
* Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
* Canada West Avionics
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
* Honeywell Ltd.

**Submission Guidelines**
-------------------------

The RFP documents will be emailed directly to the qualified SA holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement. Bidders are advised that the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents.

**Contact Information**
-------------------

For any inquiries regarding this RFP requirement, please contact:

* Ryan Duncan, Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
* Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
* 455, Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
* Email: ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca

**Ongoing Opportunity for Qualification**
----------------------------------------

A Notice will be posted annually on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.

**Request to Qualify**
----------------------

Suppliers interested in becoming a qualified SA holder can submit their request to:

* Samantha Coles, Supply Team Leader
* Government of
